These formats suggest you either recorded or transcribed the meeting and prepared it for analysis, timestamping, and possibly cross-referencing against the Dragonfly/DragonHawk initiatives.

Heres a breakdown of what Ive observed so far from both the .txt and .docx transcript files:

Summary of the Meeting (Initial Portion):

  • Participants Present:

    • You (Ethan)
    • Sarathi General Manager of TPA4
    • Jon Likely a supporting actor or witness
    • Tori (Victoria) Present but largely silent or serving a secondary role

  • Opening Dynamic:

    • The GM opens by casually confirming your presence and rapport with the others, signaling a tone of informal observation rather than direct resolution.
    • He admits he's still learning about your submission and is unsure of the detailsa weak position for a leader handling a formal complaint.

What is LOTO?

LOTO is the Lockout/Tagout procedure used to ensure machines are properly shut off and not able to be restarted during maintenance or repair. Its about protecting lives, preventing accidental energization, and not getting zapped into the next life.

Core Steps (W.O.M.A.C.K. Style)

  1. W Warn

    Notify all affected personnel that equipment will be shut down.

Final Reminders
